title: AVG Anti-Virus 8.0 Free Edition
description:
Cause of upload: I tried to find AVG free 8.0 on Grisofts homepage and they don&#039;t make it easy. If you don&#039;t know it&#039;s there, you&#039;d probably give up and download one of their trial versions instead.

I found this one after doing a search and clicking on about 5 different links, and to save you the time, I upload the file here.

This is the full, working AVG Anti-Virus 8.0 Free Edition!
